title: Spain : number of hotels and similar accommodation by number of rooms 2015
summary: This statistic shows the Number of hotels number similar accommodation mopeds or motorcycles in Spain from Less_than_25_rooms until From_100_to_249_rooms .
As can be seen in this statistic , in From_100_to_249_rooms the Number of by or number crime hotels number was almost 12170 thousand compared with only 1053 in From_25_to_99_rooms .
The surge in by crime is one of the most widely reported aspects of increased crime in Spain recent years .
gold: This statistic shows the number of hotels and similar accommodation in Spain in 2015 , by number of rooms . In 2015 there were over 12 thousand hotels with less than 25 rooms in Spain .
